channel.title: LLM Knowledge Archive
channel.description: Recent content on LLM Knowledge Archive

item.title: About LLM Knowledge Archive
item.description: We are a research team studying large language models, reading papers and researching the latest trends since 2024.
item.content:encoded:
Hi There! We are a research team studying large language models, reading papers and researching the latest trends since 2024. Our mission is to archive valuable knowledge and insights for the broader research community.

Looking forward to sharing and connecting with you!

LLM Knowledge Archive Team, 2024
